roleset.name: (cause to) be in a close group
roleset.note: CLUSTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cluster' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 22.3-2, 47.5.2. (from cluster.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: 'passive'
example.text: Instead of [Japan's typical small homes]-1 clustered *trace*-1 on narrow streets with no sidewalks, the new ``One Hundred Hills'' development will offer 65 houses on half-acre lots.
example.arg: on narrow streets with no sidewalks

example.name: with cluster, sorta
example.text: Prior to the introduction of financial futures in the late 1970s, [most trading firms]-1 clustered *trace*-1 around the LaSalle Street financial district here were family operations handed down from one generation to the next.
example.arg: around the LaSalle Street financial district here

example.name: all args
example.text: John clustered his toys into a gigantic pile.
